p: Kombucha consumption can be harmful in several cases where it is prepared incorrectly, and further consumption should be prevented in individuals with preexisting conditions which can lead to metabolic acidosis effects. After consuming certain Kombucha products, some side effects such as dizziness and nausea have been reported, and also some allergic reactions, jaundice, and head/neck pain have occurred in several patients. Another point is that the consumption of Kombucha should be prevented in lactating or pregnant women [ 80].
